kw.name: Go To Forgot Your Password Page
Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.
Click on the 'Forgot your password?' link to navigate to the forgot password page.

kw.name: Verify Forgot Your Password Page Opens
Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``.
Verify that the "Forgot Your Password" page is opened by checking the title element.
